445: Research Assistant The DSCC is hiring a research assistant to support research department efforts in the 2024 election cycle. Responsibilities include but are not limited to: Contributing to the production of DSCC research materials, with a primary focus on supporting national, map-wide research priorities; Media monitoring and helping to manage incoming media assets involving Republican Senate candidates; Assisting with the administrative work involved with running a research department; Assisting in other research projects as needed. Qualifications include but are not limited to: Previous campaign experience a plus; Highly organized; Strong attention to detail. This position is part of a collective bargaining unit. This position is based in DC. This position is expected to work out of the DSCC office located on Capitol Hill.
